alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:11AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden, southern Tipton and northeastern Shelby Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 811 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Ellendale, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Barretville, Griffin Corner, Quito, Woodstock, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville and Locke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
